sqlMap.select:
/* req2000DAO.selectReq2000ReqCommentListAjax - 요구사항 코멘트 목록 조회 */ SELECT T1.PRJ_ID , T1.REQ_ID , T1.REQ_CMNT_SEQ , T1.REQ_CMNT , T1.CMNT_ALL_CNT , T1.REG_DTM , T1.REG_USR_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(T1.REG_USR_ID, 1) AS REG_USR_NM , T1.REG_USR_IP , T1.MODIFY_DTM , T1.MODIFY_USR_ID , T1.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.REQ_ID , A.REQ_CMNT_SEQ , A.REQ_CMNT , COUNT(*) OVER() AS CMNT_ALL_CNT , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM REQ4300 A WHERE 1=1
AND A.PRJ_ID = #popupPrjId#
AND A.PRJ_ID = #selPrjId#
AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# ) T1 ORDER BY T1.REQ_CMNT_SEQ DESC
sqlMap.insert:
/* req2000DAO.insertReq2000ReqCommentInfo - 신규 요구사항 코멘트 등록(새로운 코멘트 순번 따기)*/ SELECT COALESCE(MAX(REQ_CMNT_SEQ) + 1, 1) AS REQ_CMNT_SEQ FROM REQ4300 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
/* req2000DAO.insertReq2000ReqCommentInfo - 신규 요구사항 코멘트 등록 */ INSERT INTO REQ4300 ( PRJ_ID, REQ_ID, REQ_CMNT_SEQ, REQ_CMNT, REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP, MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #reqId#, #newReqCmntSeq#, #reqCmnt#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
